item.title: The Webbie Web Browser and Accessible Applications
item.description: This article is an overview of the Webbie web browser designed with accessibility in mind, as well as the suite of accessible applications that `accompany it.

item.title: How Accessible is Discord?
item.description: Discord is a rapidly growing chat platform. It is designed with gamers in mind, but now almost every online community seems to have a discord server,
